title: Mr. Tailor v.1.2.2 - Retina Responsive WooCommerce Theme
description:
Mr Tailor is a fully responsive e-commerce premium WordPress theme from Themeforest. This stunning theme is sure to impress clients and designers alike.

Every brick & mortar should consider an online store. You can appeal to a wider market selling the same inventory you have on hand. Starting an e-commerce store is a great way to grow your business as well since your loyal customers will be able to share your site and your products with all of their friends. Mr Tailor is just the website template to get you started.

The theme includes everything you need to start your online store (except your products of course). The theme is fully responsive and retina ready, so you can add detailed product images that will look pixel perfect on any device. Plus there are lots of great options to make the theme fit your store like custom logo upload, a lovely sticky header, customizable colors, parallax image support, built-in sliders, and even an optional Wishlist you can enable for your shoppers.

Plus, being that this is an e-commerce theme, Mr Tailor is fully compatible with WooCommerce (one of the best free e-commerce WordPress plugins available). With WooCommerce and Mr Tailor you can sell physical, digital or even affiliate products making your online store super flexible. Plus, the plugin handles the complicated bits and piece of an e-commerce store for you Ã¢â‚¬â€œ checkout, shipping, tax, order tracking, ratings, coupons and more are all built right in. The best part is that each and every feature has been styled to fit with the rest of the Mr Tailor theme, so your customers experience a seamless shopping experience on your site from start to finish.

Product page: http://themeforest.net/item/mr-tailor-retina-responsive-woocommerce-theme/7292110

This wordpress theme has been fully nulled, to install simply upload it to your host like you would any other wordpress theme.
